requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status Snapshot

view.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status
view.subtitle: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

blocks.title: Member Review Bookings completed
blocks.message: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
